segments.text: I'd like to see the menu , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I'm so sorry . I thought you had one . Here you are .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't you have any Chinese food ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm afraid we don't . But I'm sure you'll enjoy our lunch special .
segments.speaker: S1
